event.title: a long time it was called

data.event: For a long time it was called "Barra" in the creolized trade language of the river, and between the seventeenth and nineteenth centuries British and French records use "Barra" or "Bar" more frequently than "Niumi".

event.title: centuries British and French records use

data.event: For a long time it was called "Barra" in the creolized trade language of the river, and between the seventeenth and nineteenth centuries British and French records use "Barra" or "Bar" more frequently than "Niumi".
The former "Al Kali" of Barra, formally known as Kenbugul Faye, died in September 2014 due to natural causes.

event.title: early 2015, the city of Barra conducted

data.event: In early 2015, the city of Barra conducted elections for their new "Al Kali" with two candidates.
